module: Module-level comment: The `altera_up_ps2_command_out` module controls the sending of commands to a PS/2 device using state machines that manage command initiation, bit-by-bit data transmission, and error handling. It utilizes input and output signals to interact with PS/2 clock lines, and employs internal counters and signals to manage timing and state transitions ensuring robust communication even in cases of timeouts or errors.
